name: Love Is All
content: Everybody's got to live together
All the people got to understand
Come on and join the band
Ring the bell and let the people know
Come on and let your feelings show
Love is all well love is all
Oh love is all you need
Love is all you need
At the Butterfly Ball
Nobody wants to hide
Love is all and all is love
At the Butterfly Ball where love is all
And it's so easy
Let your feelings show
Love is all yes love is all
At the Butterfly Ball
Love is big love is small
Love is free love is all
At the Butterfly Ball
When your back's to the wall
When you're starting to fall
You've got something to lean on
Love is everything it can make you sing
At the Butterfly Ball
